seo.siteDescription: Transform your mind, body, and spirit through spiritual courses, meditation, and holistic wellness
seo.homeTitle: Mystic International - Transform Your Mind, Body & Spirit
seo.homeDescription: Discover powerful quantum healing techniques, meditation practices, and spiritual transformation courses. Join thousands on their journey to wellness.
seo.coursesDescription: Explore our comprehensive library of spiritual courses, quantum healing programs, and meditation practices designed to transform your life.
seo.eventsDescription: Join our transformative healing events, meditation workshops, and spiritual gatherings. Connect with like-minded seekers.
seo.productsDescription: Discover curated spiritual products, healing tools, and digital resources to support your transformation journey.
seo.dashboardDescription: Access your courses, track your progress, and manage your spiritual growth journey all in one place.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our courses, events, and services

whatIsMystic.a: Mystic International is a platform dedicated to spiritual growth and personal transformation. We offer online courses, live events, and digital products designed to help you on your journey to enlightenment.

howToStart.a: Simply create an account, browse our courses and events, and enroll in any program that resonates with you. Many of our introductory courses are free!

courseAccess.q: How long do I have access to a course?
courseAccess.a: Once you purchase a course, you have lifetime access to all its content. You can revisit the materials as many times as you like.

eventOnline.a: Yes! We offer both in-person and virtual events. Virtual events can be attended from anywhere in the world.

paymentMethods.q: What payment methods do you accept?
paymentMethods.a: We accept all major credit cards, debit cards, and various local payment methods through our secure payment processor, Stripe.

refundPolicy.a: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all courses. If you're not satisfied with your purchase, contact our support team for a full refund.

lostAccess.q: I lost access to my account. What should I do?
lostAccess.a: Use the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page to reset your password. If you continue to have issues, contact our support team.

certificates.a: Yes, upon completion of certain courses, you will receive a digital certificate that you can download and share.

blog.title: Blog
blog.description: Insights, tips, and stories on your spiritual journey
blog.comingSoonMessage: We're working on bringing you inspiring content about spirituality, personal growth, and transformation. Check back soon!

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Get in touch with our team. We'd love to hear from you!
contact.name: Your Name

contact.successMessage: Thank you for your message! We'll get back to you soon.
contact.errorMessage: There was an error sending your message. Please try again.

support.title: Support Center
support.description: How can we help you today?

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: How we collect, use, and protect your personal information
privacy.introduction: At Mystic International, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or use our services.

infoCollect.title: Information We Collect
infoCollect.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, make a purchase, or contact us. This may include your name, email address, payment information, and any other information you choose to provide.

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, process transactions, send you communications, and personalize your experience.

infoSharing.title: Information Sharing
infoSharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information with service providers who assist us in operating our platform, processing payments, and delivering services.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.content: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. You may also opt out of receiving marketing communications at any time.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience, analyze usage, and assist in our marketing efforts. See our Cookie Policy for more details.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@mysticinternational.com

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: Terms and conditions for using our services
terms.introduction: Welcome to Mystic International. By accessing or using our website and services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By creating an account or using our services, you agree to these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree, please do not use our services.

accountResponsibility.title: Account Responsibility
accountResponsibility.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account.

contentOwnership.title: Content Ownership
contentOwnership.content: All content on our platform, including courses, videos, and materials, is owned by Mystic International or its content creators. You may not reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works without permission.

userConduct.title: User Conduct
userConduct.content: You agree to use our services only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms. You may not share your account access or purchased content with others.

purchases.title: Purchases and Payments
purchases.content: All purchases are processed securely through Stripe. Prices are displayed in USD unless otherwise specified. You agree to pay all fees associated with your purchases.

refunds.title: Refunds
refunds.content: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on most courses. See our Refund Policy for complete details.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: Mystic International shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising from your use of our services.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account if you violate these Terms of Service.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may modify these Terms at any time. Continued use of our services after changes constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: For questions about these Terms, please contact us at legal@mysticinternational.com

refunds.title: Refund Policy
refunds.description: Our policies on refunds and cancellations
refunds.introduction: We want you to be completely satisfied with your purchases. This Refund Policy outlines our procedures for refunds and cancellations.

coursesRefund.title: Course Refunds
coursesRefund.content: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all course purchases. If you are not satisfied with a course, you may request a full refund within 30 days of purchase, regardless of how much of the course you have completed.

eventsRefund.title: Event Refunds
eventsRefund.content: Event tickets may be refunded up to 7 days before the event date. Refunds requested within 7 days of the event are at our discretion. No refunds are available after the event has started.

digitalProducts.title: Digital Products
digitalProducts.content: Due to the nature of digital products, all sales are final once the download link has been accessed. However, if you experience technical issues, please contact support.

howToRequest.title: How to Request a Refund
howToRequest.content: To request a refund, please contact our support team at support@mysticinternational.com with your order details. Refunds are typically processed within 5-7 business days.

processing.title: Refund Processing
processing.content: Refunds will be credited to the original payment method used for the purchase. Processing times may vary depending on your bank or payment provider.

exceptions.title: Exceptions
exceptions.content: We reserve the right to deny refund requests that appear to be made in bad faith or that violate our Terms of Service.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.description: How we use cookies and similar technologies
cookies.introduction: This Cookie Policy explains how Mystic International uses cookies and similar technologies when you visit our website.

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They help the website remember your preferences and improve your experience.

typesOfCookies.title: Types of Cookies We Use
typesOfCookies.content: We use essential cookies (required for the website to function), analytics cookies (to understand how visitors use our site), and marketing cookies (to deliver relevant advertisements).

essentialCookies.title: Essential Cookies
essentialCookies.content: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. They enable core functionality such as security, network management, and accessibility.

analyticsCookies.title: Analytics Cookies
analyticsCookies.content: We use analytics cookies to understand how visitors interact with our website, helping us improve our services and user experience.

marketingCookies.title: Marketing Cookies
marketingCookies.content: These cookies are used to track visitors across websites to display relevant advertisements and measure their effectiveness.

manageCookies.title: Managing Cookies
manageCookies.content: You can control and manage cookies through your browser settings. Please note that disabling certain cookies may affect the functionality of our website.

thirdPartyCookies.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdPartyCookies.content: Some cookies are placed by third-party services that appear on our pages, such as payment processors, analytics providers, and social media platforms.

updates.title: Updates to This Policy
updates.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about our use of cookies, please contact us at privacy@mysticinternational.com
